attributes.action: deny all U.K. state benefits to all foreign nationals unless there are recipical arrangements in place with their country of origin, in terms of quality and financial aid for British Subjects, or they have been a british tax payer or been in the service of the Crown for five years
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The idea behind my petition is to make the U.K. a less atractive place for economic migrants to enter illegally.
